patthana16.17:4.1: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:4.2: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:4.3: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:4.4: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko ca naabyākato nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:4.5: Kusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko ca naakusalo nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.17:5.1: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:5.2: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:5.3: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:5.4: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko ca naabyākato nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:5.5: Akusalaṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko ca naakusalo nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.17:6.1: Abyākataṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:6.2: Abyākataṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.17:6.3: Abyākataṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacetasiko ca naakusalo nacetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.17:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.17:8.1: Acetasike hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
